details:
xen/gntdev: Prevent leaking grants

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.332 by commit b043f2cab100bed3e0a999dcf38cc05b1e4a7e41, it was introduced in version v4.9.322 by commit 36cd49b071fceca70326d9db786aa15e9fffd677. For more details please see the references link.
